reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and well-structured. She's always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Prof. Chen makes complex concepts easy to understand and provides great real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Decent course content, but Dr. Rodriguez could improve on time management during lectures.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Thompson's passion for history is contagious. His assignments are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Patel is an excellent teacher who goes above and beyond to ensure students grasp difficult concepts.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson's lectures are often confusing, and he's not very approachable for questions.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's enthusiasm for literature is evident. Her feedback on essays is particularly helpful.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Ivanov is a genius at explaining complex physics concepts. His demonstrations are always memorable.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's lectures are informative, but the workload can be overwhelming at times.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Brown is patient and thorough. He ensures everyone understands before moving on to new topics.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's lectures are like taking a journey through time. Her knowledge and passion are inspiring.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Kim's lectures can be dry, and the course material doesn't seem well-organized.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Green brings current environmental issues into the classroom, making the course very relevant.

reviews.subject: German Language
reviews.review: Prof. Müller creates a fun and immersive environment for learning German. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Patel is knowledgeable, but her exams are extremely difficult and don't always reflect the material covered in class.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Prof. Chang brings real-world marketing experience to the classroom. His projects are challenging but valuable.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Watson's Socratic teaching style really encourages critical thinking. Her classes are always thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Ahmed knows his stuff, but sometimes struggles to explain complex concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Rossi's enthusiasm for languages is infectious. Her assignments are creative and engaging.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is an outstanding educator. His ability to break down complex musical concepts is unparalleled.
